title: SpaceX
summary: SpaceX is a private American aerospace company founded by Elon Musk in 2002 with the goal of reducing space travel costs and enabling multi-planetary human colonization. The company designs and launches advanced rockets and spacecraft, achieving significant milestones like the first privately developed liquid-fueled orbital rocket (Falcon 1 in 2008) and developing reusable rocket technology. SpaceX operates the Starlink satellite internet constellation and is developing the Starship system for interplanetary transport.

factual.claim: SpaceX achieved its first orbital launch with the two-stage Falcon 1 rocket on September 28, 2008
As of 2025, Falcon 9 has conducted hundreds of missions
SpaceX operates Starlink, the largest satellite constellation in history

interpretive.statement: SpaceX's iterative engineering approach has driven unprecedented launch cadence
Technologies underscore SpaceX's approach to amortizing development costs
Legacy development cycles prioritize compliance over iteration
